area.longerText: Updown is located in the outskirts of the small village of Betteshanger outside Deal. As it's a rural area, the best way to get around is by car. You'll find some pubs and smaller shops in the area but if you're looking for something to do, Deal is your best bet! We've listed some nice places below as well as some nearby towns.

thingsToDo.name: The Rose
thingsToDo.description: Beautiful hotel with a great restaurant.

thingsToDo.name: Le Pinardier
thingsToDo.description: Lovely wine bar with cheese, charcuteries, and apéritifs.

thingsToDo.name: Frog And Scot
thingsToDo.description: Bistro with small plates and snacks.

thingsToDo.name: Deal Beach Parlour
thingsToDo.description: Retro café with ice cream desserts.

thingsToDo.name: Deal Saturday Market
thingsToDo.description: Food, flowers & other bits every Saturday between 8am – 2pm.

thingsToDo.name: Zetland Arms
thingsToDo.description: Pub on the beach in the next town south of Deal.

placesToVisit.name: Margate
placesToVisit.description: For arts and culture by the sea.

placesToVisit.name: Whitstable
placesToVisit.description: For oysters and fish and chips.

placesToVisit.name: Canterbury
placesToVisit.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site, for historic buildings and general quaintness.

placesToVisit.name: Dover
placesToVisit.description: For a walk along the white cliffs.

placesToVisit.name: Rye
placesToVisit.description: For cobbled streets, cute houses, and locally grown wine Tillingham (lovely place to stay & eat).
